entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 70 to 90 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 1:59 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
